title: Tire Pressure Regulator Hype Hits Gravel Worlds with Launch of New System – Is Paris-Roubaix Next?
content:
Marianne Vos used a re-developed Gravaa regulator when she won gravel worlds. Will it help push tire pressure pumps onto the pavé of the spring classics?

Read the full article at Tire Pressure Regulator Hype Hits Gravel Worlds with Launch of New System – Is Paris-Roubaix Next? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
